dn31:1.2: Once, the Blessed One was dwelling in Rājagaha in the Bamboo Forest, at the Squirrel Feeding Grounds.
dn31:1.3: On that occasion, the householder's son, Siṅgāla, having gotten up in the early morning and departed from Rājagaha with clean clothes and washed hair, was venerating the various directions with hands raised in homage—
